bibl.title: Sappho Fragment 17: Wishing Charaxos a Safe Trip?
The Newest Sappho: P. Sapph. Obbink and P. GC inv. 105, Frs. 1-4 = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 2

bibl.note: P. Coll. privées: P. Green Inv. 105 (= M.-P.3 1445.01; LDAB 341738) + P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= M.-P.3 1445.02; LDAB 341738). - Geographical setting of Sappho fragment 17: Messon. - Messon between myth and rite. - The incipit of Sappho fragment 17. - The Atreids in fragment 17. - Sappho fragment 17 and the Kallisteia. - The Brothers Poem and the occasion of Sappho fragment 17. - Sappho fragment 98, the Brothers Poem, and the composition of Sappho's audience. - Prayers for Charaxos and their audience. - The audience of sacral poems. - The audience and the occasion of Sappho fragment 17.
bibl.seg: Stefano Caciagli, Sappho Fragment 17: Wishing Charaxos a Safe Trip?

Anton Bierl & André Lardinois (edd.), The Newest Sappho: P. Sapph. Obbink and P. GC inv. 105, Frs. 1-4 = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 2 = Mnemosyne. Supplements. 392 (Leiden - Boston, 2016) pp. 424-448.
